tuv.seg: The Central Bank of Ireland is responsible for the regulation of all financial services firms in Ireland
Tá Banc Ceannais na hÉireann freagrach as rialachán ghnólachtaí sheirbhís airgeadais in Éirinn

The Central Bank Reform Act 2010, which commenced on 1 October 2010, created a new single body called the Central Bank of Ireland which is responsible for both central banking and financial regulation

Cruthaigh an tAcht um Athchóiriú an Bhainc Cheannais 2010, a thosaigh ar 1 Deireadh Fómhair 2010, comhlacht aonair nua ar a dtugtar Banc Ceannais na hÉireann atá freagrach as baincéireacht cheannais agus rialachán airgeadais

It replaced the previous related bodies – the Central Bank and the Financial Services Authority of Ireland (generally known as the Central Bank) and the Irish Financial Services Regulatory Authority (Financial Regulator)

Ghlac sé ionad na gcomhlachtaí bainteacha roimhe seo– Banc Ceannais agus Údarás Seirbhísí Airgeadais na hÉireann (ar a dtugtar an Banc Ceannais go ginearálta) and Údarás Rialála Seirbhísí Airgeadais na hÉireann (Rialtóir Airgeadais)
What does the Central Bank of Ireland regulate?
Céard a rialaíonn Banc Ceannais na hÉireann?
The Central Bank regulates the activities of:
Rialaíonn an Banc Ceannais gníomhaíochtaí na ndreamanna seo a leanas:
• Credit institutions, investment intermediaries, stockbrokers, financial exchanges, collective investment schemes, funds, investor compensation and related consumer issues

• Institiúidí Creidmheasa, idirghabhálaithe infheistíochta, stocbhróicéirí, malartáin airgeadais, scéimeanna comhinfheistíochta, cistí, cúiteamh infheisteora agus saincheisteanna gaolmhara um thomhaltóirí
• Life insurance, general insurance and related consumer issues
• Árachas saoil, árachas ginearálta agus saincheisteanna gaolmhara um thomhaltóirí
• Moneylenders, mortgage and credit intermediaries, the monitoring of customer charges by credit institutions and related consumer issues
• Iasachtóirí Airgid, idirghabhálaithe morgáiste agus creidmheasa, monatóireacht ar mhuirir chustaiméirí a ghearrann na hinstitiúidí creidmheasa agus saincheisteanna gaolmhara um thomhaltóirí
You can find more information on the financial institutions regulated here
Is féidir leat tuilleadh eolais a fháil ar na hinstitiúidí airgeadais atá rialaithe anseo
What is the main purpose of regulation?
Cad é an príomhchuspóir atá ag rialúchán?
The main purpose of regulation is:
Is é an príomhchuspóir atá ag rialúchán:
• To promote a safe and fair financial services market for consumers
• Margadh sheirbhís airgeadais cothrom sábháilte do thomhaltóirí a chur chun cinn
• To promote sound and solvent financial institutions, thereby giving depositors and other consumers of financial products confidence that their deposits and investments are safe
• Institiúidí slána sócmhainneacha airgeadais a chur chun cinn, agus muinín a thabhairt dá réir do thaisceoirí agus tomhaltóirí eile na dtáirgí airgeadais go mbeidh a gcuid infheistíochtaí sábháilte
The Central Bank monitors and enforces the consumer protection, conduct of business and prudential requirements of financial institutions
Déanann an Banc Ceannais monatóireacht agus feidhmiú ar chosaint tomhaltóirí, iompar gnó agus riachtanais stuamachta institiúidí airgeadais
It also sets minimum competency requirements for firms
Leagann sé síos riachtanais inniúlachta íosmhéid do chomhlachtaí
What is a code of conduct?
Cad is cód iompair ann?
The Central Bank has a number of statutory codes of conduct which oblige financial institutions to act in a fair and transparent manner, and in the best interests of their customers
Tá roinnt cóid iompair reachtúla ag an mBanc Ceannais a chuireann oibleagáid ar institiúidí airgid a ghníomhú ar bhealach cothrom trédhearcach, agus ar mhaithe lena gcuid custaiméirí
These protection codes are policed and enforced by means of on-site inspections, backed-up by enforcement powers
Déanfar na cóid chosanta seo a phóilíniú agus a fhorfheidhmiú trí iniúchtaí ar an láthair a dhéanamh, le tacaíocht ó chumhachtaí forfheidhmithe
Copies of the various codes are available on the Central Bank’s financial regulation website
Tá cóipeanna de na cóid éagsúla ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin rialachán airgeadais an Bhainc Cheannais
Where do I make a complaint about a financial institution?
Cá ndéanaim gearán faoi institiúid airgeadais?
It is important that you first make your complaint to your financial service provider
Tá sé tábhachtach go ndéanann tú do ghearán i dtosach le do sholáthraí seirbhíse airgeadais
It is best to put your complaint to your provider in writing and keep a copy of your letter
Is fearr do ghearán a dhéanamh le do sholáthraí i scríbhinn agus cóip de do litir a choimeád
You must give your provider an opportunity to look into your problem and allow them to try to reach a resolution
Ní mór duit an deis a thabhairt do do sholáthraí chun súil a chaitheamh ar d’fhadhb agus ligean dóibh iarracht a dhéanamh chun réiteach a bhaint amach
If you are still not satisfied that your complaint is being dealt with fairly by your provider, you may take your complaint to the Financial Services Ombudsman
Mura bhfuil tú sásta go fóill go bhfuil do ghearán á láimhseáil go cóir ag an ngnólacht, is féidir leat do ghearán a chur chuig an Ombudsman um Sheirbhísí Airgeadais
You can read more about making a complaint in our document: Making a complaint about a financial service provider
Is féidir leat tuilleadh a léamh faoi ghearán a dhéanamh in ár gcáipéis: Gearán a dhéanamh faoi sholáthróir sheirbhís airgeadais
Where can I find information on financial products?
Cén áit inar féidir liom eolas a fháil faoi tháirgí airgeadais?
The Competition and Consumer Protection Commission (CCPC) provides information to consumers on their rights and on the costs, risks and benefits of different financial products

Cuireann an Coimisiún um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí (CCPC) eolas ar fáil do thomhaltóirí maidir leis na cearta agus ar na costais, rioscaí agus na buntáistí a bhaineann le táirgí airgeadais éagsúla
This information also helps you to access the financial services that are most suitable to you
Cabhraíonn an t-eolas leat rochtain a fháil ar na seirbhísí airgeadais is fearr a oireann duit
The CCPC maintains financial information on its website for consumers
Coinníonn an CCPC láithreán gréasáin airgeadais do thomhaltóirí
